original: Lönnerblad, Lars Viktor, lasarettsläkare, Västervik, f. 13/5/02 i Säterbo, Väs’tmanl. 1., av kontr :prosten Jonas L. o. Maria Pettersson. G. 30 m. Margit Gustafsson. — Stud:ex. i Västerås 20, med. kand. 24 o. med. lic. 30 i upps. E. o. aman. v. anatom. inst. i Upps. 23, aman. där 24, e. o. aman. v. Seraf :las. nervklin. 29, assist :läk. v. Karlskrona las. 30-31, tf. andre und:läk. där samt v. Halmstads las. 31, e. läk. v. Akad. sjukh. röntgenavd. samt tf. las:läk. v. Vänersb. las. röntgenavd. 32, andre o. tf. förste und:-läk. v. Västerviks las. 33-34, aman. v. Akad. sjukh. röntgenavd. 34-36, und:-läk. där 37, förste und :läk. v. Radiumhemmet 37-39, las :läk. v. röntgenavd. å länslas. i Västervik sed. 39. Skr.: ett 10-tal arb. i röntgendiagnostik.
translated: Lönnerblad, Lars Viktor, hospital physician, Västervik, born on May 13, 1902 in Säterbo, Västmanland. Son of the vicar Jonas L. and Maria Pettersson. Married on June 30 with Margit Gustafsson. Completed high school in Västerås in 1920, received a Bachelor of Medicine degree in 1924, and a medical license in Uppsala in 1930. Worked as a research assistant and assistant at the Department of Anatomy in Uppsala from 1923-1924, and then as an associate physician at Serafimerlasarettet's neurology clinic in Stockholm from 1929. Also served as an assistant physician at Karlskrona Hospital from 1930-1931, temporarily as the second junior physician there, as well as at Halmstads Hospital in 1931. Worked as a physician at the radiology department of Akademiska sjukhuset (University Hospital) and temporarily as a hospital physician at Västervik Hospital's radiology department in 1932. Became the second and temporary senior junior physician at Västervik Hospital from 1933-1934. Worked as an assistant physician at the radiology department of Akademiska sjukhuset from 1934-1936, and as a junior physician there in 1937. Became the senior junior physician at Radiumhemmet from 1937-1939, and has been a hospital physician at the radiology department of the county hospital in Västervik since 1939. Has authored about 10 works in radiodiagnosis.
